biotools.summary:
Cell type classification and discovery across diseases, technologies and tissues reveals conserved gene signatures and enables standardized single-cell readouts.

Get the most out of your single cell data.

SignacX is software developed and maintained by the Savova lab at Sanofi with a focus on single cell genomics for clinical applications. SignacX classifies the cellular phenotype for each individual cell in single cell RNA-sequencing data using neural networks trained with sorted bulk gene expression data from the Human Primary Cell Atlas. To learn more, check out the pre-print, website and code base.
